description:
The Metaseries are 3D audiovisual compositions describing the “history” behind a specific “structural phenomenon” through a partially generative recombination process of geometric and sonic archetypes.

This project takes inspiration from the architecture of the blockchain, a decentralized network made up of chains of single blocks. The philosophy behind the blockcain has a similar theoretical approach to the Serialism techniques, a composition method that was developed since the first half of the 20th century in the field of music and then applied in architecture by the deconstructivism movement.
